text:
TIRUNELVELI

National Service Scheme – St. Xavier’s Higher Secondary School: Second day events, Environmental Awareness Day, fieldtrip to Krishnapuram, 9.30 a.m.; fieldwork at Arockiyanathanpuram church, 2 p.m.

Alcoholics Anonymous and Al-Anon: Regular meeting, Good Shepherd Matriculation School, 7th Street, Thiyagaraja Nagar, 7 p.m.

COURTALLAM

Post-Graduate and Research Department of Zoology – Sri Parasakathi College for Women: Seminar on ‘Recent advances in Biology,’ S. Gokul Sankar, Associate Professor of Microbiology, AIMST University, Malaysia, and P. Alagesan, Associate Professor of Zoology, Yadava College, Madurai, resource persons, college new auditorium, 9 a.m.
title: Engagements
